external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Chosen Axes

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Chosen Axes
summary: Honor, gold, and a desire to banish the curse that haunts the city of Shadespire - these are what drive the mercenary Fyreslayers. Unlock this warband and play as The Chosen Axes in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
